item.title: Katie add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Katie add a quote by Mother Theresa
item.description: "I know God won't give me anything I can't handle. I just wish he didn't trust me so much." -- Mother Theresa

item.title: Katie add a quote by Maud Hart Lovelace (Carney's House Party)
item.description: "Do you girls have hope chests?' Lloyd asked. We certainly do.' I don't,' said Betsy. 'My husband and I are going to use paper plates and napkins.' Poor Joe!' Lucky Larry!" -- Maud Hart Lovelace (Carney's House Party)

item.title: Katie add a quote by Laura Ingalls Wilder
item.description: "There's no great loss without some small gain." -- Laura Ingalls Wilder

item.title: Katie add a quote by Laura Ingalls Wilder
item.description: "The real things haven't changed. It is still best to be honest and truthful; to make the most of what we have; to be happy with simple pleasures; and have courage when things go wrong." -- Laura Ingalls Wilder

item.title: Katie add a quote by Laura Ingalls Wilder
item.description: "I am beginning to learn that it is the sweet, simple things of life which are the real ones after all." -- Laura Ingalls Wilder

item.title: Katie add a quote by Laura Ingalls Wilder
Katie add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Muster your wits; stand in your own defence..." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Katie add a quote by Laini Taylor
item.description:
"I don't know many rules to live by,' he'd said. 'But here's one. It's simple. Don't put anything unnecessary into yourself. No poisons or chemicals, no fumes or smoke or alcohol, no sharp objects, no inessential needles--drug or tattoo--and...no inessential penises either.'
'Inessential penises?' Karou had repeated, delighted with the phrase in spite of her grief. 'Is there any such thing as an essential one?'
'When an essential one comes along, you'll know,' he'd replied." -- Laini Taylor

item.title: Katie add a quote by Scott Douglas
item.description: "When I tell people I went to library school, the most common reaction is either “You’re joking, right?” or “They have schools for librarians? Do they teach you how to properly sssh people?" -- Scott Douglas
